trans-unit.source: A PDF matplotlib backend Author: Jouni K Seppänen <jks@iki.fi>

trans-unit.source: A PostScript backend, which can produce both PostScript .ps and .eps.
trans-unit.target: 一个PostScript后台,它可以生成PostScript .ps和.eps。

trans-unit.source: A Python number formatting string to be used in labeling the flow as a quantity (i.e., a number times a unit, where the unit is given).
trans-unit.target: 一个Python数字格式化字符串,用于将流量标记为一个数量(即一个数字乘以一个单位,其中单位已给出)。

trans-unit.source: A TeX "virtual font" file, or None if this font is not virtual.
trans-unit.target: 一个TeX "虚拟字体 "文件,如果该字体不是虚拟字体,则为无。

trans-unit.source: A TeX Font Metric file.
trans-unit.target: 一个TeX Font Metric文件。

trans-unit.source: A Tool for zooming using a rectangle selector.
trans-unit.target: 一个使用矩形选择器进行缩放的工具。

trans-unit.source: A TriAnalyzer encapsulates a Triangulation object and provides basic tools for mesh analysis and mesh improvement.
trans-unit.target: TriAnalyzer封装了 Triangulation 对象，并提供了用于网格分析和网格改进的基本工具。

trans-unit.source: A TriRefiner encapsulates a Triangulation object and provides tools for mesh refinement and interpolation.
trans-unit.target: TriRefiner封装了一个三角测量对象,并提供了网格细化和插值的工具。

trans-unit.source: A URL for each patch to link to once drawn. Currently only works for the SVG backend. See Hyperlinks for examples.
trans-unit.target: 绘制后要链接到的每个修补程序的URL。当前仅适用于SVG后端。有关示例，请参见超链接。

trans-unit.source: A backend-independent abstraction of a figure container and controller.
trans-unit.target: 一个独立于后台的图形容器和控制器的抽象。

trans-unit.source: A base class for Animations.
trans-unit.target: 一个动画的基础类。

trans-unit.source: A base class for AxisLabel and TickLabels.
trans-unit.target: AxisLabel和TickLabels的基础类。

trans-unit.source: A base class for AxisLabel and TickLabels. The position and angle of the text are calculated by to offset_ref_angle, text_ref_angle, and offset_radius attributes.
trans-unit.target: AxisLabel和TickLabels的基础类。文本的位置和角度由offset_ref_angle,text_ref_angle,and offset_radius属性计算。

trans-unit.source: A base class for path effects.
trans-unit.target: 路径效果的基础类。

trans-unit.source: A base class for providing timer events, useful for things animations. Backends need to implement a few specific methods in order to use their own timing mechanisms so that the timer events are integrated into their event loops.
trans-unit.target: 一个提供定时器事件的基类,对事物动画有用。后端需要实现一些特定的方法,以便使用自己的定时机制,使定时器事件集成到他们的事件循环中。

trans-unit.source: A base class of GridSpec that specifies the geometry of the grid that a subplot will be placed.
trans-unit.target: GridSpec的一个基类,用于指定子图将被放置的网格的几何形状。

trans-unit.source: A base tool, only implements trigger method or not method at all. The tool is instantiated by matplotlib.backend_managers.ToolManager
trans-unit.target: 基本工具仅实现 trigger 方法，根本不实现方法。该工具由 matplotlib.backend_managers.ToolManager 实例化。

trans-unit.source: A class that creates a grid of Axes.
trans-unit.target: 一个创建Axes网格的类。

trans-unit.source: A class that creates a grid of Axes. In matplotlib, the axes location (and size) is specified in the normalized figure coordinates. This may not be ideal for images that needs to be displayed with a given aspect ratio. For example, displaying images of a same size with some fixed padding between them cannot be easily done in matplotlib. AxesGrid is used in such case.
trans-unit.target: 一个创建Axes网格的类。在matplotlib中,坐标轴的位置(和大小)是在归一化的图形坐标中指定的。这对于需要以给定的纵横比显示的图像来说可能并不理想。例如,在matplotlib中,显示相同大小的图像,但它们之间有一些固定的填充,这就不容易做到。在这种情况下,就会使用AxesGrid。

trans-unit.source: A class that creates a grid of Axes. In matplotlib, the axes location (and size) is specified in the normalized figure coordinates. This may not be ideal for images that needs to be displayed with a given aspect ratio. For example, displaying images of a same size with some fixed padding between them cannot be easily done in matplotlib. ImageGrid is used in such case.
trans-unit.target: 一个创建Axes网格的类。在matplotlib中,坐标轴的位置(和大小)是在归一化的图形坐标中指定的。这对于需要以给定的纵横比显示的图像来说可能并不理想。例如,在matplotlib中,显示相同大小的图像,但它们之间有一些固定的填充,这就不容易做到。在这种情况下,可以使用ImageGrid。

trans-unit.source: A hack to get around that fact that this code does a two-pass parse like TeX. This lets us store enough information in the hlist itself, namely the nucleus, sub- and super-script, such that if another script follows that needs to be attached, it can be reconfigured on the fly.

trans-unit.source: A parameter for the antigrain image resize filter (see the antigrain documentation). If filternorm is set, the filter normalizes integer values and corrects the rounding errors. It doesn't do anything with the source floating point values, it corrects only integers according to the rule of 1.0 which means that any sum of pixel weights must be equal to 1.0. So, the filter function must produce a graph of the proper shape.
trans-unit.target: 反纹理图像调整大小过滤器的参数（请参阅反纹理文档）。如果设置了filternorm，则过滤器将对整数值进行归一化并纠正舍入误差。它对源浮点值不做任何事情，它仅根据1.0的规则校正整数，这意味着任何像素权重之和必须等于1.0。因此，过滤器功能必须产生适当形状的图形。

trans-unit.source: A parameter for the antigrain image resize filter (see the antigrain documentation). If filternorm is set, the filter normalizes integer values and corrects the rounding errors. It doesn't do anything with the source floating point values, it corrects only integers according to the rule of 1.0 which means that any sum of pixel weights must be equal to 1.0. So, the filter function must produce a graph of the proper shape.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于反纹理图像调整过滤器的参数(参见反纹理文档)。如果filternorm被设置,过滤器会对整数值进行归一化处理,并纠正四舍五入的错误,但对源浮点值不做任何处理,它只根据1.0的规则纠正整数。它不对源浮点值做任何事情,它只根据1.0的规则修正整数,这意味着任何像素权重之和必须等于1.0。所以,滤波函数必须产生一个适当形状的图形。

trans-unit.source: A quadrilateral mesh consists of a grid of vertices. The dimensions of this array are (meshWidth + 1, meshHeight + 1). Each vertex in the mesh has a different set of "mesh coordinates" representing its position in the topology of the mesh. For any values (m, n) such that 0 <= m <= meshWidth and 0 <= n <= meshHeight, the vertices at mesh coordinates (m, n), (m, n + 1), (m + 1, n + 1), and (m + 1, n) form one of the quadrilaterals in the mesh. There are thus (meshWidth * meshHeight) quadrilaterals in the mesh. The mesh need not be regular and the polygons need not be convex.
trans-unit.target: 四边形网格由顶点网格组成。此数组的尺寸为（meshWidth + 1，meshHeight + 1）。网格中的每个顶点都有一组不同的“网格坐标”，表示其在网格拓扑中的位置。对于0 <= m <= meshWidth和0 <= n <= meshHeight的任何值（m，n），网格坐标（m，n），（m，n + 1），（m + 1 ）处的顶点n + 1）和（m + 1，n）形成网格中的四边形之一。因此，网格中存在（meshWidth * meshHeight）四边形。网格不必是规则的，多边形也不必是凸的。

trans-unit.source: A quadrilateral mesh is represented by a (2 x ((meshWidth + 1) * (meshHeight + 1))) numpy array coordinates, where each row is the x and y coordinates of one of the vertices. To define the function that maps from a data point to its corresponding color, use the set_cmap() method. Each of these arrays is indexed in row-major order by the mesh coordinates of the vertex (or the mesh coordinates of the lower left vertex, in the case of the colors).
trans-unit.target: 四边形网格由（2 x（（meshWidth + 1）*（meshHeight + 1）））numpy数组坐标表示，其中每一行是其中一个顶点的x和y坐标。若要定义从数据点映射到其对应颜色的函数，请使用 set_cmap() 方法。这些数组中的每个数组都通过顶点的网格坐标（或在颜色的情况下为左下顶点的网格坐标）以行优先顺序进行索引。

trans-unit.source: A renderer is needed to compute the bounding box. If the artist has already been drawn, the renderer is cached; thus, it is only necessary to pass this argument when calling get_window_extent before the first draw. In practice, it is usually easier to trigger a draw first (e.g. by saving the figure).

trans-unit.source: A texmf tree typically includes mapping files called e.g. psfonts.map, pdftex.map, or dvipdfm.map. The file psfonts.map is used by dvips, pdftex.map by pdfTeX, and dvipdfm.map by dvipdfm. psfonts.map might avoid embedding the 35 PostScript fonts (i.e., have no filename for them, as in the Times-Bold example above), while the pdf-related files perhaps only avoid the "Base 14" pdf fonts. But the user may have configured these files differently.
trans-unit.target: texmf树通常包括称为 psfonts.map ， pdftex.map 或 dvipdfm.map 的映射文件。该文件 psfonts.map 被使用dvips， pdftex.map 由pdfTeX的，并 dvipdfm.map 通过的dvipdfm。 psfonts.map 可能避免嵌入35种PostScript字体（即，没有文件名，如上面的Times-Bold示例所示），而与pdf相关的文件则可能仅避免使用“ Base 14” pdf字体。但是用户可能已对这些文件进行了不同的配置。

trans-unit.source: API Overview

trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for GUI neutral widgets
trans-unit.target: GUI中性小部件的抽象基类

trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for classes implementing mesh refinement.
trans-unit.target: 实现网格细化的类的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for classes used to find the triangles of a Triangulation in which (x, y) points lie.
trans-unit.target: 抽象的基类,用于寻找(x,y)点所在的三角形。

trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for classes used to find the triangles of a Triangulation in which (x,y) points lie.
trans-unit.target: 抽象的基类,用于寻找三角形的(x,y)点所在的三角形。

trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for classes used to interpolate on a triangular grid.
trans-unit.target: 用于在三角网格上进行插值的类的抽象基类。

trans-unit.target: 用于在三角网格上执行插值的类的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for objects that render into a FigureCanvas.
trans-unit.target: 渲染到FigureCanvas中的对象的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for the axis ticks, grid lines and labels.
trans-unit.target: 轴刻度线、网格线和标签的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for writing movies.
trans-unit.target: 用于编写电影的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for writing movies. Fundamentally, what a MovieWriter does is provide is a way to grab frames by calling grab_frame().
trans-unit.target: 用于编写电影的抽象基类。从根本上讲,MovieWriter所做的是提供一种通过调用grab_frame()来抓取帧的方法。

trans-unit.source: Add an additional margin on the path in coordinates of point. The path is extended tangentially by radius/2; i.e. if you would draw the path with a linewidth of radius, all points on the line would still be considered to be contained in the area. Conversely, negative values shrink the area: Points on the imaginary line will be considered outside the area.
trans-unit.target: 在point的坐标上的路径上添加一个额外的边距。路径以半径2沿切线方向延伸；即，如果您使用半径为r的线宽绘制路径，则该线上的所有点仍将视为包含在该区域中。相反，负值会缩小面积：假想线上的点将被视为面积之外。

trans-unit.source: Add an additional margin on the path in coordinates of points. The path is extended tangentially by radius/2; i.e. if you would draw the path with a linewidth of radius, all points on the line would still be considered to be contained in the area. Conversely, negative values shrink the area: Points on the imaginary line will be considered outside the area.
trans-unit.target: 在路径上以点的坐标添加额外的边距。路径以半径2沿切线方向延伸；即，如果您使用半径为r的线宽绘制路径，则该线上的所有点仍将视为包含在该区域中。相反，负值会缩小面积：假想线上的点将被视为面积之外。

trans-unit.source: Additional Animation objects that should be included in the saved movie file. These need to be from the same matplotlib.figure.Figure instance. Also, animation frames will just be simply combined, so there should be a 1:1 correspondence between the frames from the different animations.

trans-unit.source: All arguments may be 1D or 2D. U, V, C may be masked arrays, but masked X, Y are not supported at present.
trans-unit.target: 所有参数都可以是1D或2D。U，V，C可以是掩码数组，但目前不支持掩码X，Y。

trans-unit.target: 所有参数的名称如下:'颜色'、'x'、'ymax'、'ymin'。

trans-unit.source: All bins that has count less than cmin or more than cmax will not be displayed (set to NaN before passing to imshow) and these count values in the return value count histogram will also be set to nan upon return.
trans-unit.target: 将不会显示计数少于cmin或大于cmax的所有bin （在传递给imshow之前将其设置为NaN），并且返回值计数直方图中的这些计数值也将在返回时设置为nan。

trans-unit.source: All bins that has count less than cmin will not be displayed and these count values in the return value count histogram will also be set to nan upon return
trans-unit.target: 所有计数小于cmin的bin将不被显示,而这些计数值在返回值直方图中也将被设置为nan。

trans-unit.source: All bins that has count more than cmax will not be displayed (set to none before passing to imshow) and these count values in the return value count histogram will also be set to nan upon return
trans-unit.target: 所有计数超过cmax的bin将不被显示(在传递给imshow之前设置为none),这些计数值在返回值计数直方图时也将被设置为nan。

trans-unit.source: All built-in colormaps can be reversed by appending _r: For instance, gray_r is the reverse of gray.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过添加 _r 来反转所有内置的颜色图：例如， gray_r 是 gray 的反面。

trans-unit.source: All but the first of these are stripped from the input kw set.
trans-unit.target: 除第一项外,其余均从输入千瓦组中剥离出来。

trans-unit.target: 所有尺寸均为图形宽度或高度的分数。默认值由 rcParams["figure.subplot.[name]"] 。

trans-unit.source: All extra keywords arguments are passed to the created axes. If axes_class is given, the new axes will be created as an instance of the given class. Otherwise, the same class of the main axes will be used.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他关键字参数都传递给创建的轴。如果指定axes_class，则将创建新的轴作为给定类的实例。否则，将使用相同类别的主轴。

trans-unit.source: All forms above set the xmargin, ymargin and zmargin parameters. All keyword parameters are optional. A single positional argument specifies xmargin, ymargin and zmargin. Passing both positional and keyword arguments for xmargin, ymargin, and/or zmargin is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 以上所有表格都设置了xmargin、ymargin和zmargin参数。所有关键字参数都是可选的。一个位置参数可以指定xmargin、ymargin和zmargin。同时传递位置参数和关键字参数的xmargin、ymargin和/或zmargin是无效的。

trans-unit.source: All indexable objects are supported. This could e.g. be a dict, a pandas.DataFrame or a structured numpy array.
trans-unit.target: 支持所有可索引对象。例如，这可以是 dict ， pandas.DataFrame 或结构化的numpy数组。

trans-unit.source: All indexable objects are supported. This could e.g. be a dict, a pandas.DataFame or a structured numpy array.
trans-unit.target: 支持所有可索引对象。例如，这可以是 dict ， pandas.DataFame 或结构化的numpy数组。

trans-unit.source: All input arguments that are not passed unchanged are returned as ndarrays after removing the points or rows corresponding to masks in any of the arguments.
trans-unit.target: 所有未被原封不动地传递的输入参数,在去掉任何一个参数中对应掩码的点或行后,以ndarrays的形式返回。

trans-unit.source: All keyword arguments are passed through to the PathPatch constructor. The properties which cannot be overridden are "path", "clip_box" "transform" and "clip_path".

trans-unit.source: All the Matplotlib date converters, tickers and formatters are timezone aware. If no explicit timezone is provided, rcParams["timezone"] (default: 'UTC') is assumed. If you want to use a custom time zone, pass a datetime.tzinfo instance with the tz keyword argument to num2date, plot_date, and any custom date tickers or locators you create.
trans-unit.target: 所有Matplotlib日期转换器，代码和格式化程序都支持时区。如果未提供显式时区，则 rcParams["timezone"] （默认值： 'UTC' ）。如果要使用自定义时区， num2date 带有tz关键字参数的 datetime.tzinfo 实例传递给num2date， plot_date 以及您创建的任何自定义日期行情指示器或定位符。

trans-unit.source: All the Matplotlib date converters, tickers and formatters are timezone aware. If no explicit timezone is provided, the rcParam timezone is assumed. If you want to use a custom time zone, pass a datetime.tzinfo instance with the tz keyword argument to num2date(), plot_date(), and any custom date tickers or locators you create.
trans-unit.target: 所有Matplotlib日期转换器，代码和格式化程序都支持时区。如果未提供显式时 timezone 则假定为rcParam 时区。如果要使用自定义时区， num2date() 带有tz关键字参数的 datetime.tzinfo 实例传递给num2date（）， plot_date() 以及您创建的任何自定义日期行情指示器或定位符。

trans-unit.source: All values assumed to be in range [0, 1]
trans-unit.target: 所有数值均假定在[0,1]范围内。

trans-unit.source: All values must be in the range [0, 1]
trans-unit.target: 所有数值必须在[0,1]范围内。

trans-unit.source: All voxels are plotted as 1x1x1 cubes on the axis, with filled[0, 0, 0] placed with its lower corner at the origin. Occluded faces are not plotted.
trans-unit.target: 将所有体素在轴上绘制为1x1x1立方体，并以其下角位于原点的位置 filled[0, 0, 0] fill [0，0，0]。遮挡面未绘制。

trans-unit.source: All voxels are plotted as 1x1x1 cubes on the axis, with filled[0,0,0] placed with its lower corner at the origin. Occluded faces are not plotted.
trans-unit.target: 所有的体素都在轴上绘制成1x1x1的立方体,填充[0,0,0]以其下角为原点。被遮挡的面不会被绘制出来。

trans-unit.source: Allowed keyword arguments are color and size. E.g. it may be useful to set the color of the markers if prop="sizes" is used; similarly to set the size of the markers if prop="colors" is used. Any further parameters are passed onto the Line2D instance. This may be useful to e.g. specify a different markeredgecolor or alpha for the legend handles.
trans-unit.target: 允许的关键字参数是color和size。例如，如果使用prop =“ sizes”，设置标记的颜色可能会很有用；类似地，如果使用prop =“ colors”，则设置标记的大小。任何其他参数都将传递到 Line2D 实例上。例如，对于图例手柄指定不同的markeredgecolor或alpha，这可能很有用。

trans-unit.source: Allowed kwargs are color and size. E.g. it may be useful to set the color of the markers if prop="sizes" is used; similarly to set the size of the markers if prop="colors" is used. Any further parameters are passed onto the Line2D instance. This may be useful to e.g. specify a different markeredgecolor or alpha for the legend handles.
trans-unit.target: 允许的kwarg是颜色和大小。例如，如果使用prop =“ sizes”，设置标记的颜色可能会很有用；类似地，如果使用prop =“ colors”，则设置标记的大小。任何其他参数都将传递到 Line2D 实例上。例如，对于图例手柄指定不同的markeredgecolor或alpha，这可能很有用。

trans-unit.source: Along each column of a, (steps - 1) points are introduced between each original values; the values are linearly interpolated.
trans-unit.target: 沿着每列一个， (steps - 1) 每个原始值之间引入点; 值是线性插值的。

trans-unit.source: Alpha must be a scalar between 0 and 1, or None.
trans-unit.target: Alpha必须是一个介于0和1之间的标量,或者无。

trans-unit.target: 箭头和标签的 Alpha 值 默认为 1。

trans-unit.source: Also, because of how Axes3D objects are drawn very differently from regular 2D axes, some of these settings may have ambiguous meaning. For simplicity, the 'z' axis will accept settings as if it was like the 'y' axis.
trans-unit.target: 此外,由于Axes3D对象的绘制方式与常规的2D轴有很大的不同,其中一些设置可能会有模糊的含义。为了简单起见,"z "轴将像 "y "轴一样接受设置。

trans-unit.source: Also, the keyword argument "depthshade" is available to indicate whether or not to shade the patches in order to give the appearance of depth (default is True). This is typically desired in scatter plots.
trans-unit.target: 同样，关键字参数“ depthshade”可用于指示是否为色块着色以赋予外观深度（默认为True）。这在散点图中通常是需要的。

trans-unit.source: An Artist: xy is interpreted as a fraction of the artist's Bbox. E.g. (0, 0) would be the lower left corner of the bounding box and (0.5, 1) would be the center top of the bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Artist ：XY被解释为艺术家的一小部分 Bbox 。例如，（0，0）将是边界框的左下角，而（0.5，1）将是边界框的中央顶部。
